Shared arguments for MLX/base reduction helpers.

mlx_reduction_base.Rd

Shared arguments for MLX/base reduction helpers.

Arguments

x

An array or mlx tensor.

na.rm

Logical; currently ignored for mlx tensors.

dims

Dimensions passed through to the base implementation when x is not an mlx tensor.

...

Additional arguments forwarded to the base implementation.

Developed by David Hugh-Jones.
